articles.title: Shield AI’s founder on death, drones in Ukraine, and the AI weapon ‘no one wants’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Shield AI cofounder Brandon Tseng has raised over $1 billion to create AI pilots. Here's what he's learned in Ukraine and the future of AI-powered weapons.
articles.content: About two months ago, Shield AI co-founder Brandon Tseng and one of his employees were in an Uber weaving through Kyiv, Ukraine. They were headed to a meeting with military officials to sell them on … [+6751 chars]
